page.title: 01VILLAGES
page.content: This block contains the villages of Tarrant Gunville, Chettle, the Northern part of Tarrant Hinton nd surrounding counryside which is grass and arable and with several wooded areas. The A354 Blandford to Salisbury road passes through the SE corner of the block giving easy access to the nearest town of Blandford forum some 5/6 miles to te south. Tarrant Gunville and Tarrant Hinton lying in the same valley and linked by the same road have more intercourse with each other than Chettle has with either, lying North of both on its own minor road and having more of an individual identity. The whole of Chettle is owned by members of one family and the land worked by tenant farmers.
